subtitleNullable: Office of the Secretary of State Press Releases during the Biden Administration
descriptionNullable:
The goal of this dataset is to be a part of a build out a comprehensive dataset of all of the secretaries of state statements and briefings since the Clinton Administration (first administration to have a website). 

These statements can be very lengthy, and are of high value for journalism and tracking linguistic changes over time on different issues. Because of the relevance of the statements to current events, this is highly joinable with news datasets to compare and contrast tone, content, etc of an administration versus other source.

As additional administrations are built out, contrasting language between two administrations on the same topic could be a great source of inspiration for additional nlp. With tags and phrase extraction, taxonomic expansion could be accomplished and these indexed for rapid analysis.

The companion dataset for the Trump Administration is here: https://www.kaggle.com/datasets/speckledpingu/secretary-of-state-press-releases-trump/data

The companion dataset for the Obama Administration is here:
https://www.kaggle.com/datasets/speckledpingu/secretary-of-state-press-releases-obama/data
title: Secretary Of State Press Releases (Biden)
